subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|寶|f=⿱珤貝|t=玉}}. Officially adopted as the simplified form of {{zh-l|*寶}} in the ''Chinese Character Simplification Scheme'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|s:漢字簡化方案|漢字簡化方案|suf=》}}) in 1956.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text: {{zh-see|寶|sv}} <!-- Refer 《宋元以來俗字譜》 and http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?quote_code=QTAxMDU2LTAwMQ#33 -->
